description: Updates your application and its dependencies. See https://update.angular.io/

packages.description: The names of package(s) to update.

force.description: Ignore peer dependency version mismatches. Passes the `--force` flag to the package manager when installing packages.

all.description: Whether to update all packages in package.json.

next.description: Use the prerelease version, including beta and RCs.

migrateOnly.description: Only perform a migration, do not update the installed version.

oneOf.description: The name of the migration to run.

from.description: Version from which to migrate from. Only available with a single package being updated, and only on migration only.

to.description: Version up to which to apply migrations. Only available with a single package being updated, and only on migrations only. Requires from to be specified. Default to the installed version detected.

allowDirty.description: Whether to allow updating when the repository contains modified or untracked files.

verbose.description: Display additional details about internal operations during execution.

createCommits.description: Create source control commits for updates and migrations.
